properties.title: Cabane d'Orny CAS
properties.description: Located on the way into the Swiss part of the Montblanc range, the triangular, spacious cabin is the starting point for mixed tours, climbing tours and day hikes. It is accessible in a mere two-and-a-half hours on a mountain trail starting from La Breya (Champex Lac). The cabin on the verge of the glacier and a morainal lake is particularly suited for training courses. In summer hikers pass the cabin on the way to Trienth√ºtte.
